description:
Hades is a rogue-like dungeon crawler in which you defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash 
your way out of the Underworld of Greek myth.

0.10.0.description:
-First implementation of a trap system
-Adding support to manually call /resync from client to match and check item and locations between game and client
-Improving how hades communicate with client
-Fixing Codex. Now it also shows the gods correct friendship level (with the first one being blocked behind the keepsake) and it shows a message if they are missing the nectar check
-Now Hades will catch checked location on the savefile. Will try to send them to server when starting a new run or with the /resync command. Useful for unstable connections.
-Improvement of organization in options (and hence yaml template)
-Some cleaning in apworld. Added item and location groups.

Update 1: Fixing memory leak on cosmetics manager.
Update 2: Fixing hints causing client disconections.
Update 3: Fixing issue with source generation.
Update 4: Fixing a small bug that could happen with item printing.
Update 5: Fixing bug in trap counting.

0.10.1.description:
- Improvement on the printing of items to avoid certain crashes
- Adding automatic hint system when seeing things in the contractor store and the fated list
- Improvements on logic for keepsakes
- Fixing a bunch of typos on documentation and code and printing errors.
- Fixing a bug with the health trap, in which you wouldn't die if the trap was supposed to kill you.

Edit: Fixing bug in trap counting

Update: Fixing trap to be marked as trap items. Fixing Deathlink killing you bypassing death defiance's (which aligns better with other games, such as LoZ. Thanks to @Ongion )
Update2: Fixing error with fated list hinting
Update3: Fixing error with some fated lists having incorrect name.

0.11.0.description:
- Adding option to automatically collect all locations from a weapon once it is used to defeat Hades (or all room locations on room based location mode).
- Adding helper items to help boost standard stats. One raises Zagreyus max health and the other one the rate at which one obtain rare/legendary/duo boons (note those are blocked from appearing the first three runs)
- Improving logic. Fixing spread in rooms (so now important items will not appear past room 60 on a weapon/room based system). Fixing some errors with certain settings that made some locations unreachable.
- Fixing location id generations. Now it should generate the same id for the same location every time.
- Streamlining how the initial weapon is equipped. Should fix bugs in weird cases.
- Fixing bug with item and locations groups, which would give nonsense on some settings.
- Adding system that shows finishing conditions on defeating Hades.
- New version enumeration system. Now version X.Y should be compatible with all X.Y versions.

Hotfix: Fixing initial weapon getting equipped on every run start.

0.11.1.description:
- Adjusting logic on fates, so they are less expected to be done early on
- Fix bug on Orpheus keepsake location logic
- Fixing room logic rebalancing so it aligns better with the biomes (so it balances on rooms 14-24-36)
- Adding option to rebalance how much of each helper is wanted
- Fixing bug with max health helper getting lost on reload
- Adding option presets

0.11.2.description:
- Fixing logic for multiple weapon clears
- Putting guard for missing finishing information
- Potentially fixing max health helper bugs

0.11.3.description: -Fix for max health helper bugs. Hopefully this is the last update I need to do for this system.

0.11.4.description:
- Improving system that sends message from client to game. Getting rid of styx scribe shared. Should be more stable to use.
- Fixing bug with FatedList items not being shown correctly
- Rebalancing "logic gates" so they are "before the boss"
- Fixing balancing in styx temple late with items that skipped balancing.
- Fixing logic errors regarding ElysiumFountainLocation
- Making system that caches information of last hades victory.
- Making giving nectar to npcs give their first line in registry to avoid annoying bugs
- Fixing small issues on readme.
- Adding debug prints to start up routine so we can debug more easily. Hopefully will help get mac version working.

0.12.0.description:
- Fixing breaking API changes with Archipelago, working with versions 0.5.0 and up.
- Codex will point out if a weapon has been used to defeat Hades or not
- Fixing problem with plando and later Styx chambers
- Fixing some bugs with Health Helper
- Tweaking Thanatos Keepsake logic so it is expected post-Hades

Updating: fixing bug in which printing in game would just show "invalid item"

0.12.1.description:
- Making Demeter only appear from second run onwards. Fixes some UI problems when she was picked instead of Athenea
- Fixing Charon fight room not giving a check
- Various documentations improvements.

0.12.2.description: Adding Initial Money Helpers, an AP Item that boost the initial Money of your run.

0.12.3.description:
- Fixing id clash on initial money helper
- Fixing logic problem in Fountain Upgrade not expecting Tartarus Fountains.
- Yet another attempt to fix max health helper bugs
- Putting a system to avoid screen getting filled with print messages when resuming the game. Will just print "Many other items obtained" when a certain threshold of items are obtained quickly. 
- Fixing a bunch of typos in printing

Edit: rolling back fix for the max health helper that might cause crashes on some instances.

0.13.0.description:
- Changing items/locations naming in client side to be in line to other AP games
- Showing version of mod in the title screen thanks to @Aeltael 
- Fixing logic errors relating to progressive items
- Fixing deathlinks not getting received
- Fixing a bunch of bugs related to health punishments
- Fixing a bunch of bugs related to health helpers

0.13.1.description:
- Fixing issues with weaponsanity. This should fix weapons not getting unlocked after getting the item due to a race condition and crashes when buying the items when weaponsanity is off.

- Changing deathlink system entirely. Now we check if we can give the death, and if not we queue it as a trap that will get activated with the trap system can send it to the player without causing issues. Should fix errors with deathlink activating in cutscenes and such.

0.13.2.description:
Changing deprecated API to work with AP 0.6.2. 

Thanks to @Philanche and @Exempt-Medic for suggestions, although I did a slightly different thing

0.14.0.description:
WARNING: THIS IS A PRE-RELEASE VERSION RELEASED FOR TESTING. I DOUBT THIS IS BUG FREE OR EVEN STABLE. IF YOU WANT TO PLAY A GAME WITHOUT HAVING TO WORRY ABOUT THIS, PLEASE TRY 0.13.2

- Various rewrite to address comments for Archipelago pull request. In particular the client was basically rewritten entirely. Also, this should be better for garbage collection for python, so better performance as a benefit.
- Fixing typo in Vanilla Heat setting
- Hades client now searches for StyxScribe on the folder that the script is selected (fixing the issue in which people choose HadesSubsume as a mistake).
- Changing some message between the client and stxyscribe to use a better encoding. This should allow for people to have dashes on their name.
- Rebalancing a bunch of fates locations to be later in logic.
- Added a bunch of extra fates to fatesanity.
- Allowing to disable late styx locations. Also late styx changed from being from room 60 to 55.
- Improved way of handling filler items, allowing people to tweak the filler item pool

0.15.0.description:
WARNING: THIS IS A PRE-RELEASE VERSION RELEASED FOR TESTING. I DOUBT THIS IS BUG FREE OR EVEN STABLE. IF YOU WANT TO PLAY A GAME WITHOUT HAVING TO WORRY ABOUT THIS, PLEASE TRY 0.13.2

- Fixing some error with the disable late styx option
- Better balancing for custom loyalty
- Increasing cap of fates needed to kill hades for a victory up to 52. I dont know how long that game would last, but you do you!
- Using the new encoding to send hints. This fixes crashes when fates had a "-" character on their name. Also breaks compatibility with older versions (hence, jumping to 0.15.0)

0.15.0-hotfix.description:
WARNING: THIS IS A PRE-RELEASE VERSION RELEASED FOR TESTING. I DOUBT THIS IS BUG FREE OR EVEN STABLE. IF YOU WANT TO PLAY A GAME WITHOUT HAVING TO WORRY ABOUT THIS, PLEASE TRY 0.13.2

Fix for hint encoding not parsing correctly in some cases, causing a crash on StyxScribe, which broke items/locations being sent.

This may break the hint sending from store / fated list, but it should stop games crashing so I we take those until I can get a consistent repro.
0.15.0-hotfix.title: 0.15.0-hotfix

0.15.1.description:
WARNING: THIS IS A PRE-RELEASE VERSION RELEASED FOR TESTING. I DOUBT THIS IS BUG FREE OR EVEN STABLE. IF YOU WANT TO PLAY A GAME WITHOUT HAVING TO WORRY ABOUT THIS, PLEASE TRY 0.13.2

- Updating generation to avoid a logical error in which turning shopsanity off would make a location unobtainable
- Fixing error with version checking on Hades side. This would cause the error mesage of incompatible version not to display when it should. 
- Version checking now will be more aggresive, spaming messages on every room check.

0.4.1.1.description: Fixing deathlink. Fixing cost of extreme meassure when using the reverse order.

0.5.0.description:
-Big number of bug fixes in the new generation of locations
-Erasing use of match command, should hopefully help with compatibility with more versions of python
-New QoL improvements (due to @doesboknow )
-Version checking between Server, Client and Game
-Keepsakesanity mode added. 

MINOR UPDATES:
-Fixing crashes when giving nectar with keepsakesanity turned off and giving nectar Aphrodite, Hades and Persephone.

0.5.1.description:
- Various bug fixes. Rework on how the location system works to fix some "desync" errors that were popping up.
- Making mirror open and close when unlocking new tier of skills. Fixes incompatibility with routine inspection.
- Reworking Temple of Styx logic, so later areas of the temple has a lower chance of having important items.
- Adding new templates to the repo. Should give more options for people to start playing the game.

0.5.2.description:
-Fixing bug in which more locations that intended were created in the score mode.
-Fixing bug in which keepsakes sometimes wont be sent.

0.6.0.description:
Implementing weaponsanity, initial weapon, minimal number of keepsafes for victory and the ability of ignoring greece death for deathlink.

Weapon system implementation based on https://github.com/doesboknow/Fresh-File-Weapon-Edits by @doesboknow 

Edit: Fixing weapons getting unlocked multiple times.
Edit: patch for end game crash.

0.6.1.description: Fixing bug with weapon and keepsake ids interfering with each other.

0.7.0.description:
-Implementing StoreSanity: important items from the store are suffled into the item pool and the store slots become location checks.
-Better logic for weapons: they get distributed "uniformly" along the run.
-Various bugfixes for weaponsanity. Hopefully fixing bug for printing multiple times the weapons.
-Fixing logic for weapons and keepsakes so balancing dont replace them by filler items in the backlog pool
-Weapons aspects can be bought from the start (thanks to @doesboknow for this on WeaponStartMod. This was supposed to be brought in for weaponsanity, but an oversight left it out).

Update: fixing cosmetics crash. Bringing fix for aspects not being unlockable.

0.8.0.description:
Adding FatedList as locations. Adding HiddenAspectSanity to shuffle hidden items as item into the item pool.

Fixing bugs with deathlink not working, aspects not being able to be unlocked.

Change in communication system from client to hades, changing to a more efficient approach. Should help desyncs.

Update: fixing cosmetics crash

Update2: Fixing some errors in the logic and options of the apworld. Attempting to fix problems when playing with SA2 which can cause crashes.

Update3: Trying to fix RoR2 compatibility.

0.9.0.description:
-New modes for heat (minimal and vanilla), plus new mode for locations (location per weapon).

-Fixing multiple prints from npc when given nectar repeatedly.
-Erasing CodexItem from system to avoid crashing error
-Fixing sword always be counted as unlock for fatedlist and game systems.
-Fixing bug for hidden aspect fist.
-Giving default item name for fatedlist. May solve issues when the game cant load the AP name.

Update: Fixing inconsistent logic in weapon counting.
Update2: Fixing various bugs with vanilla heat mode. Solved credits-ending runs not triggering the run completed sequence.

0.9.1.description:
-Various bugfixes with item ids and strings on both polycosmos and apworld. Fixing bugs with heat system forgetting your heat out of nowhere.
-Rewriting apworld to follow archipelago coding conventions.
-Rewriting options and data storage system so all is stored in hades. Helps stability.
-Making a "sync" system to try to resync. Much better than forcing players to quit.
-Rewriting filler system to be compatible with sync system. Also, filler items are not stored on save filed. Again, more stable, but also allows player to restart their savefile and still receive the filler items.
-Rewriting heat system to be compatible with new sync system
-Updating documentation. Adding spanish documentation.

Update: Making some improvements on desync system. Fixing timer being used on unintended settings.
Update2: Fixing a crash on the last update. 
Update3: Fixing some location management that created problem with more than one hades game being played.
Update4: Improvements in generation to manage locations better.
Update5: Fixing from source compilation
Update6: Fixing location count for fillers once again. Cleaning a bit the option class and the templates.

pre-0.13.0.description:
WARNING: THIS RELEASE IS MISSING TESTING ALL ITS CHANGES. I am releasing this to give people that are willing to help to test changes, but most likely has some errors given the so many changes it has. You have been warned.

- Updating with changes for Archipelago PR. This includes changes to almost every item and location name. This should make them more redeable in Client.
- Fixing some more bugs with Health Helpers
- Fixing some cases in which errors would cause save files to get corrupted
- Improving the routines of traps and helpers to they are calculated in more efficient ways
- Adding provided logo to main screen (Thanks to @Aeltael )
- Fixing bug in which Hard Labor and Heightened Security wouldnt have any effect and just be their default base value
pre-0.13.0.title: alpha pre-0.13.0
